text:
Panguni festival began with flag-hoisting at the Madhusoodhana Perumal Temple in Parakkai on Monday.

The flog was hoisted by Mathur Ashram Thanthri Sankara Narayanaguru after Ganapathy homam in the morning.

As part of the festival, the presiding deity would be taken on Mada Veedhi of temple by a decorated car on the 9th and 10th day. Theppathiruvizha will take place in the temple tank on March 23, temple sources said.

The arrangements for the festival are being done by the officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowment Board and the Seva Sangam of the temple.
title: Panguni festival begins
